title: Random Media plays when locked
content:
This started a few weeks ago since the newest Android revision release and followed me from my pixel 3 to my new pixel 5.

Media will randomly start playing from Chrome

I will be looking at a website in the chrome browser, then I'll switch to a different app click the power button set the phone down... A minute later BLARING OUT OF THE SPEAKERS will be a random ad playing!

I have all notifications disabled for chrome
